content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for it?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the offer. I'm looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to get the highest price for my apartments. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How much are you willing to offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that you want the highest price, but as a student, I'm on a budget. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Can you provide me with your lowest price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but as a landlord, I cannot afford to give discounts. The price I'm asking for is already very competitive. If you're looking for a lower price, I suggest you look elsewhere.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm not asking for a discount. I'm simply seeking a price that aligns with the market value of the apartment. Could you please inform me of the lowest price you would consider for this unit?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: The market value of this apartment is quite high due to its location and amenities. As the landlord, I'm not interested in giving away my property for less than it's worth. If you're unable to afford the market price, I'm sorry, but we may not be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position as a landlord. However, as a student, I'm looking for a price that reflects my financial situation. Is there any flexibility in your pricing that could accommodate my budget?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I must remain firm on the value of my property. If you cannot afford the market price, I would recommend you to look for an apartment that better fits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time. I understand that we may not be able to reach an agreement on the price. I will consider other options that better fit my budget. Thank you for your assistance.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mister Wang. I'm sorry we couldn't come to an agreement. Good luck with your search for an apartment that meets your needs and budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your help and wish you the best in finding a suitable tenant for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
